hero.title: İletişim
hero.subtitle: Group
hero.description: With a deep-rooted history approaching 100 years, İletişim Group, one of Turkey's largest industrial and services groups, continues to add value to the country's economy by operating in more than 25 sectors.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: İletişim Group
about.description: One of Turkey's most established companies with nearly a century of experience
about.companyDescription1: With over 25 years of experience, we serve as a trusted partner for businesses on their digital transformation journey. We write success stories together with our customers through modern technologies and innovative solutions.
about.companyDescription2: We are industry leaders with our quality service approach, customer satisfaction-focused approach and continuous development-oriented working principles.
about.servicesDescription: We offer comprehensive technology solutions tailored to your business needs

brandValues.description: Our values, shaped by over 25 years of experience, continue to guide us in every project.
